newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian castor firms in narrow trade, new stocks.
newsitem.headline: Indian castor firms in narrow trade, new stocks.

text.p: Indian castorseed March delivery prices on Wednesday firmed at 1,132/1,134 rupees on limited activity, dealers said.
"Fresh export enquiries remained slow but limited new crop arrivals kept the market quiet," one dealer said.

He said castorseed arrivals at producing centres dropped on account of severe cold weather. Groundnut oil rose 342/343 rupees per 10 kg from 338/339 rupees on buying for this month's wedding season coupled with lower arrivals of about 70/80 tonnes against the daily average of 100/120 tonnes last week.
"In Rajkot spot oil rose by 10 to 525 rupees per 15 kg.
